Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with narrow mouth, straight rim, short straight-walled bottleneck and unstable base with convex bottom. Reddish-coloured paste. Exterior surface covered with orangey-coloured coating which is partially lost. The upper third presents a painted decoration of black parallel horizontal lines which encircle the piece, demarcated by three bands with circles in black (upper and lower) and reddish (middle) colours.
